error.errorDescription: Sorry, we couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.

home.homeTextImage: Your help can change someone else's life
home.homeText: The Au Temps Donné association is a humanitarian organization, created in 1987 in the department of Aisne, in Saint Quentin in response to the industrial crisis affecting the region. register.partnerText: Make a difference by becoming our partner. Your company can have an immediate positive impact. Join us now!
register.beneficiaryText: Explore new horizons by accepting sharing. Compassionate individuals are ready to accompany you. Open the door to a multitude of mutual aid opportunities in your path.
register.volunteerText: Be part of something bigger by becoming a volunteer. Your contribution, even small, can change lives. Join us, make a difference!
